item.title: Amazon Simple Storage Service (S3) Glacier Instant Retrieval üéöÔ∏è
item.description: Amazon Simple Storage Service (S3) Glacier Instant Retrieval What is Amazon Simple Storage Service (S3)? Amazon S3 is one of the main building blocks of AWS. It’s advertised as" infinitely scaling" storage. It’s widely popular and deserves its section S3 provides unlimited storage space and works on the pay-as-you-use model. Service rates get cheaper as the usage volume increases Amazon S3 allows people to store objects (files) in “buckets” (directories). S3 resources, e.
